name: rdd
description: Preview your `README.md` locally as it would appear on Github, with live updating. Useful for Readme Driven Development.
author: Lim Yuan Qing

scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn build-css && yarn build-js
scripts.build-css: mkdir -p build && cat src/style.css node_modules/highlight.js/styles/default.css node_modules/highlight.js/styles/github.css node_modules/github-markdown-css/github-markdown.css | csso --output build/bundle.css
scripts.build-js: mkdir -p build && browserify src/client.js | uglifyjs --compress --mangle > build/bundle.js
